title: Border (Portugal), early 17th century
description: Off-white linen band embroidered in off-white, yellow and beige silks, with needle lace edging on three sides. A design of addorsed centaurs with spears and sheilds shooting arrows at dragons standing on scrolling vines, is repeated along the length of the band.

tombstone.epitaph: Border (Portugal), early 17th century. silk embroidery on linen foundation. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-904.
